definition: to revive old dreams (idiom); to relive past experiences
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: Can't repeat the past?" he cried incredulously."
sentences.chinese: “不能重温旧梦？”他大不以为然地喊到。

sentences.english: If two people mean to be together, eventually they will find their way back.
sentences.chinese: 如果两个人注定在一起最终他们会找到重温旧梦的路。

sentences.english: I am reliving moments, This is just residual grief.
sentences.chinese: 我只是重温旧梦，这只是对你的怀念。

definition: to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane
to make friends again/to renew old cordial relations
to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane
a shattered mirror put back together (idiom)/(of marriage) to pick up the pieces and start anew/for a separated couple to reconcile and reunite
lit. to rest and fly together (idiom)/fig. to live in each other's pockets/to be inseparable
to see each other/to meet in person
reluctant to leave/to hate to have to go/to recall fondly
to forget previous differences/to bury the hatchet
